headline: EOG Resources (EOG) Reports Lower Revenue And Income With 2025 Production Guidance
summary: EOG Resources (EOG) recently reported second-quarter results, showing declines in revenue and net income compared to the previous year, with basic earnings per share from continuing operations dropping to USD 2.48 from USD 2.97. Despite these declines, the company's share price rose 4% over the last quarter. This performance occurred amid a backdrop of a rising overall market, where major indexes like the S&P 500 saw gains. EOG's stable production guidance, alongside the declaration of an...

headline: EOG Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates on Higher Oil Equivalent Production
summary: EOG beats on Q2 earnings as oil-equivalent production rises 8.3%, offsetting lower price realizations.

headline: EOG Resources Soars Past Q2 Earnings Expectations
summary: EOG Resources reported strong second quarter 2025 earnings, exceeding analyst expectations due to robust production volumes and effective cost management, while also expanding its operational footprint and returning significant capital to shareholders.
